content: tail to sew closed the gap between the legs photo j g h f i j @ 2024 willow&wild all rights reserved squirt the turtle 6 of 6 assembly k l attach the arms to round 2 of the body on either side photo k position the shell onto the back the top of the shell will sew into round 2 between the arms sew the shell onto the body using the m long yarn tail in taupe you can sew through the blo in round 6 of the shell or sew a back stitch through round 5 of the shell to the body photo l nose in black n o sew two nostrils into round 9 on a diagonal positioned between the eyes secure the ends inside the head photo m tail in aquatic 1 8 single_crochet in magic_ring 8 2 increase x 8 16 3-4 single_crochet around 16 2 rounds x 16 single_crochet = 32 single_crochet 5 single_crochet 2 decrease x 4 12 6 single_crochet 1 decrease x 4 8 7-9 single_crochet around 8 3 rounds x 8 single_crochet = 24 single_crochet lightly stuff the ball of the tail so that it holds its shape 10 fold in half and single_crochet the edges together single_crochet 4 photo n fasten_off and sew between the legs and shell photo o @ 2024 willow&wild all rights reserved
